name: Central Park Residence
description: Steps from Central Park, this peaceful stay blends greenery with Manhattan luxury. Great for joggers and romantics.

name: Times Square Hotel
description: Bright lights, big energy. This hotel places you in the buzzing heart of NYC’s entertainment zone.

name: Brooklyn Art House
description: Hip, creative, and just a little bit rebellious. A perfect stay for those who want murals, music, and matcha.

name: Fifth Avenue Suites
description: Shop ‘til you drop, then relax in modern luxury. These sleek suites are just steps from world-class boutiques.

name: Harlem Jazz Lodge
description: Stay in NYC’s cultural heart. Vintage charm, live music, and soulful vibes make this a unique pick.

name: SoHo Loft Hotel
description: Industrial chic meets boutique cool in the fashionable SoHo district. Great for designers and Instagrammers.

name: Manhattan Luxe
description: Pure elegance in the center of the Big Apple. Perfect for luxury travelers, business trips, or weekend indulgence.

name: Chelsea Garden Hotel
description: Modern interiors and leafy rooftop lounges. Close to galleries, markets, and The High Line.

name: Greenwich Village Inn
description: Charming, historic, and a little bohemian. Ideal for travelers who like their stay with a side of poetry and jazz.

name: Lower East Side Vibes
description: Trendy and fun. This hotel puts you near edgy bars, indie shops, and the best late-night eats in town.

name: Tribeca Hideout
description: Quiet luxury in NYC’s film-famous neighborhood. A restful base close to restaurants, parks, and style.

name: NoHo Urban Escape
description: Minimalist design with maximum convenience. Easy access to downtown, uptown, and all points in between.
